about_the_game:
The game world is based in a small town in Finland called Multia but for game design reasons it's not 100% accurate.

This is a really simple game but it makes up for it with at least a kind of interesting story.

Explore the world and find parts for your rocket and launch it into space!
The game gives you instructions for what part you should find next but you have to figure out what part you can use.

The game has a hidden story that isn't told to you directly but which you can figure out by exploring the world and finding details.

  • 3 different rockets
  • 3 different endings
Most of the endings have comedic aspects and there are some throughout the game.

This game is complete but will receive some small updates like new rockets, new parts, new endings, and of course bug fixes, maybe additions to the story.
Multia Space Program is one of the side projects that I'll release during the development of my early access game Project Ultra, I'll make small games like this while I'm figuring out what I'll do next for Project Ultra.
detailed_description:
The game world is based in a small town in Finland called Multia but for game design reasons it's not 100% accurate.

This is a really simple game but it makes up for it with at least a kind of interesting story.

Explore the world and find parts for your rocket and launch it into space!
The game gives you instructions for what part you should find next but you have to figure out what part you can use.

The game has a hidden story that isn't told to you directly but which you can figure out by exploring the world and finding details.

  • 3 different rockets
  • 3 different endings
Most of the endings have comedic aspects and there are some throughout the game.

This game is complete but will receive some small updates like new rockets, new parts, new endings, and of course bug fixes, maybe additions to the story.
Multia Space Program is one of the side projects that I'll release during the development of my early access game Project Ultra, I'll make small games like this while I'm figuring out what I'll do next for Project Ultra.
name: Multia Space Program

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-9300H
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 (mobile)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: probably runs with slower hardware but this is the slowest hardware the game has been tested on
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexuelle Andeutungen
Derbe Sprache
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: Ever wanted to build a rocket out of junk? Well, now you can! This game exists in the same multiverse as Project Ultra and is in fact a prequel! A short adventure but hopefully a lot of fun!
